info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 14 at 11:45PM MDT by NWS GreatFalls
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southeastern Lewis and Clark, northwestern Broadwater, and northeastern Jefferson Counties through 1245 AM MDT... At 1144 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 19 miles northwest of East Helena to 10 miles southwest of Helena to near Boulder. Movement was northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Helena, Townsend, Boulder, East Helena, Montana City, Wolf Creek, Basin, Wickes, York, Rimini, Alhambra, Corbin, Spring Meadow Lake State Park, Austin, Elkhorn State Park, Marysville, Winston, Craig, Silos and Clancy. This includes the following highways... Interstate 15 between mile markers 156 and 241. Highway 12 between mile markers 1 and 83. Highway 287 near mile marker 1 . MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
